title: Babes in toyland
brief_description: Santa Claus’s incompetent assistants accidentally make some giant wooden soldiers, which come in useful when a villian tries to take over Toyland. A musical fantasy based on the Operetta by Victor Herbert and Glen McDonough with music adapted and conducted by George Bruns and choreography by Tom Mahoney. Stars Ray Bolger, Tommy Sands, Annette Funicello, Ed Wynn.
